title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.3 - Required payment date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.3 - Required payment date

State Regulations

The required payment date shall be 30 calendar days, excluding legal holidays, after the merchandise/invoice receipt ("MIR")
date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
18.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
